description: Introduced new Pro and Enterprise pricing plans with extended features.
Added support for role-based access control in the Enterprise plan.
Introduced team collaboration tools in the Enterprise plan.
Added multi-user access and custom integrations to Pro plan.
Pricing plan descriptions and target audience fields.
Improved pricing plan feature details for better clarity.
Optimized the backend query structure for faster plan retrieval.
Resolved an issue with the API response time on pricing plans.
Fixed a bug causing incorrect plan pricing display on mobile devices.
Introduced basic pricing plan with community access and manual backups.
Added custom branding options to Pro and Enterprise plans.
Updated API access limits for all pricing plans.
Fixed minor UI issues in the pricing page.
Initial release of pricing plans: Basic, Pro, and Enterprise.
Implemented email support and basic analytics for Basic plan.
Included priority support and advanced analytics for Pro plan.
